title: Balance Transfer Credit Cards: A Complete Guide
excerpt: Learn how balance transfer cards can help you pay off debt faster and save on interest.
editorial_summary: This comprehensive guide explains balance transfer credit cards, including how they work, when they make sense, and what to watch out for. It covers 0% APR offers, balance transfer fees, credit score requirements, and how to use balance transfers effectively as part of a debt payoff strategy. The article includes tips for choosing the right card and avoiding common pitfalls.
